description: TaskRunResult contains the outcome and metadata from a task run execution.

changelog.description:
Resource name of the changelog entry created by this run.
 Format: instances/{instance}/databases/{database}/changelogs/{changelog}

detail.description: Detailed execution information or error message.

endPosition.description: Ending position in the SQL statement where an error occurred.

exportArchiveUid.description: UID of the export archive generated for export tasks.

priorBackupDetail.description: Backup details that can be used to rollback changes.

startPosition.description: Starting position in the SQL statement where an error occurred.

version.description: Schema version after the migration was applied.

title: Task Run Result
